verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:1
verses.text: Porro filiis Aaron hæ partitiones erant. Filii Aaron : Nadab, et Abiu, et Eleazar, et Ithamar.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:2
verses.text: Mortui sunt autem Nadab et Abiu ante patrem suum absque liberis : sacerdotioque functus est Eleazar, et Ithamar.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:3
verses.text: Et divisit eos David, id est, Sadoc de filiis Eleazari, et Ahimelech de filiis Ithamar, secundum vices suas et ministerium.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:4
verses.text: Inventique sunt multo plures filii Eleazar in principibus viris, quam filii Ithamar. Divisit autem eis, hoc est, filiis Eleazar, principes per familias sedecim : et filiis Ithamar per familias et domos suas octo.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:5
verses.text: Porro divisit utrasque inter se familias sortibus : erant enim principes sanctuarii, et principes Dei, tam de filiis Eleazar quam de filiis Ithamar.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:6
verses.text: Descripsitque eos Semeias filius Nathanaël scriba Levites, coram rege et principibus, et Sadoc sacerdote, et Ahimelech filio Abiathar, principibus quoque familiarum sacerdotalium, et Leviticarum : unam domum, quæ ceteris præerat, Eleazar : et alteram domum, quæ sub se habebat ceteros, Ithamar.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:7
verses.text: Exivit autem sors prima Jojarib, secunda Jedei,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:8
verses.text: tertia Harim, quarta Seorim,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:9
verses.text: quinta Melchia, sexta Maiman,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:10
verses.text: septima Accos, octava Abia,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:11
verses.text: nona Jesua, decima Sechenia,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:12
verses.text: undecima Eliasib, duodecima Jacim,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:13
verses.text: tertiadecima Hoppha, decimaquarta Isbaab,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:14
verses.text: decimaquinta Belga, decimasexta Emmer,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:15
verses.text: decimaseptima Hezir, decimaoctava Aphses,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:16
verses.text: decimanona Pheteia, vigesima Hezechiel,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:17
verses.text: vigesima prima Jachin, vigesima secunda Gamul,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:18
verses.text: vigesima tertia Dalaiau, vigesima quarta Maaziau.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:19
verses.text: Hæ vices eorum secundum ministeria sua, ut ingrediantur domum Domini, et juxta ritum suum sub manu Aaron patris eorum, sicut præceperat Dominus Deus Israël.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:20
verses.text: Porro filiorum Levi qui reliqui fuerant, de filiis Amram erat Subaël, et de filiis Subaël, Jehedeia.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:21
verses.text: De filiis quoque Rohobiæ, princeps Jesias.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:22
verses.text: Isaari vero filius Salemoth, filiusque Salemoth Jahath :

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:23
verses.text: filiusque ejus Jeriau primus, Amarias secundus, Jahaziel tertius, Jecmaan quartus.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:24
verses.text: Filius Oziel, Micha : filius Micha, Samir.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:25
verses.text: Frater Micha, Jesia : filiusque Jesiæ, Zacharias.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:26
verses.text: Filii Merari : Moholi, et Musi. Filius Oziau : Benno.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:27
verses.text: Filius quoque Merari : Oziau, et Soam, et Zachur, et Hebri.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:28
verses.text: Porro Moholi filius, Eleazar, qui non habebat liberos.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:29
verses.text: Filius vero Cis, Jerameel.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:30
verses.text: Filii Musi : Moholi, Eder et Jerimoth : isti filii Levi secundum domos familiarum suarum.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:31
verses.text: Miseruntque et ipsi sortes contra fratres suos filios Aaron coram David rege, et Sadoc, et Ahimelech, et principibus familiarum sacerdotalium et Leviticarum, tam majores quam minores : omnes sors æqualiter dividebat.
